Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in San Bartolome de Tirajana (San Agustin), IFA Beach Hotel - Adults Only is convenient to El Aguila Beach and Playa de San Agustin. This beach hotel is within close proximity of Las Burras Beach and Kasbah Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 200 guestrooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge), a hair salon, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of IFA Beach Hotel - Adults Only. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift). Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of IFA Beach Hotel - Adults Only. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge), a hair salon, and a television in the lobby.

Located in San Bartolome de Tirajana (San Agustin), IFA Beach Hotel - Adults Only is convenient to El Aguila Beach and Playa de San Agustin. This beach hotel is within close proximity of Las Burras Beach and Kasbah Shopping Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

El Aguila Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Las Burras Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 3.1 km / 2 mi
Yumbo Shopping Center - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Meloneras Beach - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Palmitos Park - 10.2 km / 6.4 mi
Puerto Rico Shopping Center - 16.5 km / 10.3 mi

The preferred airport for IFA Beach Hotel - Adults Only is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 23.6 km / 14.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for IFA Beach Hotel is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 23.6 km / 14.7 mi.
